D i s t r i b u t i o n: Afghanistan , Albania , Algeria , Armenia , Austria , Azerbaijan, Croatia (mainland, Hvar, Krk), Cyprus , Czech Republic , Egypt , France (mainland, Corsica ), Germany , Greece (mainland), Hungary , Iran , Israel , Italy (mainland, Sardinia , Sicily ), Jordan , Kazakhstan , Lebanon , Lybia, Malta , Moldova , Morocco , Russia , Slovakia , Spain (mainland), Switzerland , Syria , Tajikistan , Turkey , Turkmenistan , Ukraine , Uzbekistan .
